title: description
Instructional Event: An instructional activity that takes place during a Section

title: properties.metadata.properties.createdBy.description
Instructional Event: The name of the originator (user or system) of the data. This is informational only
column3: do not use in business logic!

title: properties.metadata.properties.createdOn.description
Instructional Event: The date and time when the entity instance was created

title: properties.metadata.properties.modifiedBy.description
Instructional Event: The name of the modifier (user or system) of the data. This is informational only
column3: do not use in business logic!

title: properties.metadata.properties.modifiedOn.description
Instructional Event: The date and time when the entity instance was last modified

title: properties.id.description
Instructional Event: A globally unique identifier of an instructional activity to be used in all external references

title: properties.title.description
Instructional Event: The full name of an instructional activity.

title: properties.description.description
Instructional Event: A description of an instructional activity.

title: properties.instructionalMethod.properties.id.description
Instructional Event: The global identifier for Instructional Method

title: properties.workLoad.description
Instructional Event: The amount of work involved in teaching a Section.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.timePeriod.description
Instructional Event: The period of time to be repeated.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.timePeriod.properties.startOn.description
Instructional Event: The beginning of the time period being repeated.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.timePeriod.properties.endOn.description
Instructional Event: The end of the time period being repeated.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.description
Instructional Event: The rule that describes how to repeat the time period.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.description
Instructional Event: Rules for repeating on a daily basis.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.interval.description
Instructional Event: Number of days between each repetition.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.ends.description
Instructional Event: When to end the daily repetitions.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.ends.oneOf.properties.date.description
Instructional Event: The date after which to stop repeating.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.description
Instructional Event: Rules for repeating on a weekly basis.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.interval.description
Instructional Event: Number of weeks between each repetition.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.daysOfWeek.description
Instructional Event: The days of the week on which to repeat the event.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.ends.description
Instructional Event: When to end the weekly repetitions.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.ends.oneOf.properties.date.description
Instructional Event: The date after which to stop repeating.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.description
Instructional Event: Rules for repeating on a monthly basis.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.interval.description
Instructional Event: Number of months between each repetition.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.repeatBy.description
Instructional Event: How to calculate the day of the month on which to start repeating.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.repeatBy.oneOf.properties.dayOfMonth.description
Instructional Event: The number of the day in the month on which to start repeating.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.repeatBy.oneOf.properties.dayOfWeek.description
Instructional Event: The cardinal day of the week (e.g.
column5: etc.) in the month on which to start repeating.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.repeatBy.oneOf.properties.dayOfWeek.properties.occurrence.description
Instructional Event: The nth occurrence of the day of the week in the month. Use a positive number to count from the start of the month (e.g.
column5: and a negative number to count from the end of the month (e.g. -1 = last in the month

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.ends.description
Instructional Event: When to end the monthly repetitions.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.ends.oneOf.properties.date.description
Instructional Event: The date after which to stop repeating.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.description
Instructional Event: Rules for repeating on an annual basis.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.interval.description
Instructional Event: Number of years between each repetition.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.ends.description
Instructional Event: When to end the yearly repetitions.

title: properties.recurrence.oneOf.properties.repeatRule.oneOf.properties.ends.oneOf.properties.date.description
Instructional Event: The date after which to stop repeating.

title: properties.locations.description
Instructional Event: The locations where the instructional event will take place.

title: properties.locations.items.properties.location.oneOf.description
Instructional Event: A physical location within the organization where the event will take place

title: properties.locations.items.properties.location.oneOf.properties.site.description
Instructional Event: The physical site where the event will take place

title: properties.locations.items.properties.location.oneOf.properties.room.description
Instructional Event: T room where the event will take place.

title: properties.locations.items.properties.location.oneOf.description
Instructional Event: A meeting location available via a computer network
column3: such as an online video conference.

title: properties.locations.items.properties.location.oneOf.properties.phoneNumber.description
Instructional Event: The international telephone number of the location.

title: properties.locations.items.properties.location.oneOf.properties.phoneExtension.description
Instructional Event: The telephone extension number of the location's telephone.

title: properties.locations.items.properties.location.oneOf.properties.webAddress.description
Instructional Event: The primary web address (URL) of the online meeting location.

title: properties.locations.items.properties.location.oneOf.description
Instructional Event: A human-readable description of a location.

title: properties.instructorRoster.description
Instructional Event: The roster of instructors assigned to teach an instructional event

title: properties.instructorRoster.items.properties.instructor.description
Instructional Event: The person assigned to teach an instruction method of a section

title: properties.instructorRoster.items.properties.workLoadPercentage.description
Instructional Event: The rate or proportion per hundred of the instructional method's work load that is attributable to the instructor.

title: properties.instructorRoster.items.properties.responsibilityPercentage.description
Instructional Event: The rate or proportion per hundred of the responsibility for managing the instructional method's activities that is attributable to the instructor.

title: properties.instructorRoster.items.properties.workStartOn.description
Instructional Event: The date when an instructor is assigned to start teaching the scheduled event for a Section.

title: properties.instructorRoster.items.properties.workEndOn.description
Instructional Event: The date after which an instructor is no longer assigned to the scheduled event for a Section.

title: links.description
Instructional Event: The individual events created from this instructional event specification.
